actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 5 of the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964.

summary.text: Extends to July 1, 1974, Federal financial assistance under the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 if such grants comply with the specified terms and conditions of the Act. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 1604)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5 of the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964.
